document.p: If you connect a USB printer device to the 's USB port, you can share the printer device(s) with other devices that are connected to your local network (mostly computers).
document.stem: The Printer Sharing card in the Advanced View displays the following information:
document.li1: The status of the printer sharing service
document.p: To open the Printer Sharing page, click the Printer Sharing card in the Advanced View .
The printer sharing settings are grouped into the following sections:
document.li2:
Enabled
Allows you to enable or disable the printer sharing service.
document.li1: The Printer Information section contains the following information:
